ValidationRule.description: Post-migration request: Account should not be mandatory for Internal Cases of the Type 'Fraud'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, 'Rest') || CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, 'Internal') || CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, 'Entry') || CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, 'Finan')) && ISCHANGED(Status) && ISBLANK(AccountId) && (TEXT (Status) = "Closed" || TEXT (Status) = "Resolved") && NOT(ISCHANGED(ContactId)) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'Fraud')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Enquiry')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Case_Reason__c,'New Sign Up')) && NOT( $Permission.Exclude_from_Validation )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please specify an Account for the Case
